name: Nuclear Army Bomb Truck 2018
description:
Army forces are responsible for transportation of nuclear bomb & so are army transport services hired to take full responsibility.Drive this army transporter truck simulator to take nuclear bombs.Your army warfare should be ready for battle & destroy warfield. So drive transport truck to deliver dangerous cargo nuclear bombs, safely to nuclear warheads in mega vehicle simulator to be perfect driver warrior.Drive your transport vehicle truck simulator on differnt city places and reache it destination.Do not drop nuclear bomb,so place them properly on truck.Play the new series of Bomb Transport in 3D.You play a role of a Bomb Transporter and have a tough job ahead.Transport nuclear bombs intrucks from the storage to Truck Parking zone.Complete this task by transporting all bombs within time to the destination without fall or damage.ou need to be fast! Check the mines placed on the battle ground.You have powerful missiles loaded on jumbo military truck. Drive safe in Missile Attack Army Truck 3d simulation game.
You play a role of military soldier transporting ammunition .Your job is to transport the bombs in a Monster Truck in a given time. So, be careful while driving, check the timer! You have a difficult task ahead. Enjoy the Truck simulator game with different city destination.Become a professional truck driver! One of the best simulation games.This is right and tough job for all those action packed lovers ahead and your duty is to take missile to the base station without any damage to the bomb transport.All your task is thrilling and easy, you have to make sure to transfer the truck to a secure location
otherwise your truck will lead to a great damage and mission failed.Experience the multiple varieties of obstacles including in this speed bumps and mines that are placed on ground in every advanced levels.You need to be fast because u have limited amount of time to reach the destination to place the Nuclear truck.
Bring on the explosion with Real City Bomb transporter.Transport a wide array of explosives. Be very careful! A very small mistake may cause a huge explosion.Military and drive US army Missile Launcher to bomb missiles on militants. This army truck driving game is most realistic 3d Missile Launcher simulation war game based on real army tactics.Enemies won’t be able to defend your missiles,so they try to stop your truck.
Features:
-Awesome Truck driving challenges
-Smooth controls and fun
-3D graphics gives realistic experience
-Thrilling and action packed simulator
-AMAZING city scene
